description:
Whether they are building snowmen or hitting the slopes, these waterproof and warm gloves will keep little hands cozy.

  • Polyester with reflective detail across the top
  • Auclair-Dry Silver membrane is waterproof, windproof and breathable keeps hands dry and regulates temperature
  • Polyurethane synthetic leather palm with sandblast texture for grip
  • Warm 3M Thinsulate insulation
  • Soft brushed bemberg lining
  • Adjustable wrist strap
  • Elastic cord on cuff keeps snow out
name: Auclair Camo Flash Gloves - Children to Youths
